content: this traditional-style crochet blanket is perfect to add warmth to a room stitched in bernat forever fleece you ll do a combination of half_double_crochet and chains to create the framed pattern blanket is done in one piece and also features the half_double_crochet 2 together technique we love it in the soothing tone featured but you can bring the pattern to life in any color that matches your decor
